title: Sonny Bhatia
text: Aaditya (Sonny) Bhatia is a Captain in the US Army and currently an instructor of Computer Science at the United States Military Academy at West Point.

title: Sonny Bhatia
text:
Research Topics
Collective Intelligence; Cognitive Patterns; Software Architecture
